reviews.text: It's not that great and taste is not that great. Just a fast food place and for chinese chefs to get their fried rice wrong , must be very bad. They gave some deep fried item in our veg meal, not sure,.what do they use to deep fry. It's expensive but food doesn't stand for the price. There was simple ask salt pepper and were not able to find in complete store and didn't see any interest from staff to locate.Staffs are rude, My experience was not great and least recommended place to go.

The food is good and the place is clean and comfortable.great service and nice place to chilled with my family. shirley is very friendly when i approach her to ask for some recommendation rides. thanks so much
Ordered their Christmas set meal the food is really good and i glad I made the right choice to enter Starbot cafe to give a try. Shirley service is very warm and friendly. Thanks you ðŸ˜Š
